A weather front spread welcome showers across the Bay Area on Sunday, paving the way for a much more intense atmospheric river storm expected to drench the region and bring heavy snowfall to the Sierra later Sunday evening into Monday.

One year in, Kamala Harris says she won’t be distracted by ‘ridiculous’ headlines

In a wide-ranging interview with The Chronicle, Vice President Kamala Harris reflected on the opportunities and constraints of her position. She also weighed in on some of the pivotal issues that will shape the political landscape going into next year’s midterm elections, warning of grave consequences if the Supreme Court overturns Roe vs. Wade.
